item.description:
Learn about the relationship communication styles and preferences for each type, relationship dynamics between the types and ways to make it optimal! Herb has years of experience working with couples and families and relationship dynamics between the types. Don't miss this opportunity to learn what works better between the types!

 

Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling is a leading expert in the Enneagram, having taught 2000 Enneagram workshops in over 20 years and he is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram, as well as Herb's Tips for Living, both of which you can purchase from Herb. He is a therapist, phone coach, and a workshop leader and trainer for groups and organizations.

 

781 648 3737, herb@herbpearce.com, www.herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, corner of Tanager and Wollaston and West St.
item.why: It will improve your relationship skills tremendously.
item.name: Enneagram and Relationship Dynamics
